sim.author: VooDoo and The FGUK Development Dream Team with Geed (Sound), Petar Jedvaj, Detlef Faber, F-GTUX, Paolo Amoroso

help.title: Lockheed-Martin F-35A Lightining II

key.name: O/o
key.desc: Deploy/Retract Tail Hook (Not for Deck Landings!)

help.line: To start up and shutdown the aircraft, use the button on the left side of the cockpit, the "AutoStart" command in the menu, or the corresponding key on the keyboard.
Apply full power, hold the stick back. Take off will occur at 140-160kts on a clean aircraft.
This aircraft is equipped with automatic flaps and slats.
You can pull up a Special HUD by clicking in the center of the HUD glass.
To operate the external lights, use the panel on the left side of the cockpit.
Press the map on the main screen to switch the "Radar Mode". Press again to switch to "Map Mode".
To use the ground access ladder, click on its hatch.
STATION 2 External: GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
STATION 3 External: Auxiliary Tanks, GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
STATION 9 External: Auxiliary Tanks, GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
STATION 10 External: GBU-12, AIM-120, AGM-154, AGM-158
